Through original programming, documentaries, and expert-led discussions, MHTN aims to increase awareness, provide valuable information, and encourage open conversations about mental well-being.

programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: It Is Written
programme.desc: "It Is Written" has been a staple on American television since premiering in 1956. The weekly program, currently hosted by John Bradshaw, applies timeless truths to everyday life, with many episodes dealing with issues such as loneliness, fear, low self-esteem and spiritual principles. With its straightforward, uplifting presentations, the program aims to inspire and encourage people of all faiths and creeds. Founded by George Vandeman, "It Is Written" was the first religious telecast to air in color.

The weekly program, currently hosted by John Bradshaw, applies timeless truths to everyday life, with many episodes dealing with issues such as loneliness, fear, low self-esteem and spiritual principles. With its straightforward, uplifting presentations, the program aims to inspire and encourage people of all faiths and creeds. Founded by George Vandeman, "It Is Written" was the first religious telecast to air in color.

programme.desc: During the Civil War, Union forces stationed in Colorado are hampered by raiders who have been stealing their horses as they travel through the mountains. When several commanding officers begin to suspect a traitor is revealing troop movements, Maj. Lex Kearny (Gary Cooper) goes undercover to investigate. However, the assignment strains Kearny's relationship with his wife, Erin (Phyllis Thaxter), after he chooses to continue the operation instead of searching for their runaway son.

programme.title: More Dead Than Alive
programme.desc: An outlaw responsible for many deaths, Cain (Clint Walker) is released from prison after years behind bars. Despite his earlier wicked ways, Cain has made a real effort to reform and just wants to be left in peace. Unfortunately, his reputation limits his employment options, and he's left with no choice except becoming a performer in a Wild West show. Working for promoter Dan Ruffalo (Vincent Price), Cain attempts to lead a relatively quiet life, but other gunslingers are still out to get him.

programme.title: The Comancheros
programme.desc: After his partner is killed, aging Texas Ranger Jake Cutter (John Wayne) is assigned to capture gambler Paul Regret (Stuart Whitman), a condemned prisoner who managed to escape hanging, and return him to Louisiana to face his sentence. But once Cutter has him in custody, they encounter the Comancheros, a fierce band of outlaws providing guns and booze to the Comanches, and are forced to work together to stop them. When Regret proves his worth in the fight, Cutter begins to reevaluate his duties.

programme.desc: Experience the life-changing presence of God as you watch the passion for Jesus in Canada.

programme.title: Catch the Fire
programme.desc: Experience the life-changing presence of God as you watch the passion for Jesus in Canada.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S2 E4 Who's the Cowboss? Now down to ten cowboys, the competition continues with an all-new immunity challenge that focuses on a whole different aspect of cowboyin' — business acumen. The contestants must prove they know the cattle market by estimating the value of various livestock at auction. Trace asks the contestants to continue to train the colts from the last elimination challenge, but they struggle to develop a plan that will work for everyone. The elimination challenge tests the contestants' team strategy, roping, and speed. Each team has forty-five minutes to collect fifteen gold ear tags from mixed herds in two different pastures. Frustrations build when the green team has trouble with the pens, and a cow escapes during the blue team's run. As the competition intensifies, one cowboy tries to get rid of his biggest competition. Unimpressed by how the teams handled the challenge, Trace shakes things up by sending two cowboys home.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E9 Spirits Rachel falls for a military division agent who has a drinking problem. When his issues start affecting her, Rachel reveals that she's had a problem with alcohol in the past. Meanwhile, with Teaspoon and other riders away, Noah heads a slim crew.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E1 Trail of Hate Three bank robbers come to the McCain Ranch and force Lucas into helping them rob the North Fork Bank. One robber stays behind to guard Mark while the other two take Lucas to town. They threaten to kill Mark, unless Lucas cooperates with the gunmen.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E2 Woman from Hog Ridge When Lucas and Mark catch two young men stealing a horse, Lucas is forced into a shootout. He captures one of the men, but Ma Boyle's son is killed in the gunfight. Soon after the killing, the Boyle clan comes to hang the person responsible.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E3 Seven A prison wagon carrying seven criminals stops in North Fork for supplies. The men escape, barricade themselves in the North Fork Saloon, and take saloon owner, Frank Sweeney, hostage. Lucas must act quickly to save Sweeney and the town from harm.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E4 The Pitchman A fast-talking con man and his teenage son stop at Lucas McCain's Ranch and try to talk their way into securing the mineral rights. However, the plan backfires when they discover the gold they thought was on the property is actually fool's gold.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E8 Pocketful of Stars In order to bypass sacred Shoshone burial grounds, Cheyenne scouts land for the railroad. Cheyenne's deal doesn't satisfy the railroad foreman and others. They try to eliminate him by any means possible, including using a Chinese girl to poison him.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E9 The Vanishing Breed Appointed to fill an empty seat in the senate, Cheyenne starts a campaign to preserve the American bison after a tragic buffalo stampede. He soon discovers that politics is really not his strong suit and should return as a gunfighter.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S3 E3 Man Down! Bubba’s back in the saddle with the guys when his horse bucks and throws him on a bone-breaking fall, fractures his cowboy spirit and immobilizes his work with the cattle company. Booger enlists a bullfighter to help him wrangle his ornery Brahman cattle, and considers whether or not he has enough land to maintain the growing herd. Misty gives Cody a gift from the heart that captures both their past as a couple and honors their growing family legacy as ranchers. The guys pitch each other competing ideas for their future steakhouse, and Cody’s brainstorm stands out as the one with true cowboy vision... including a name for their venture.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S3 E4 Filet of Dreams Bubba’s in a pinch when Cody urges him to ease his aching back with acupuncture. Cody and Misty have to find out why their herd is losing so many stillborn calves before it threatens their new business. Booger discovers the ups and downs of “daddy duty” when he takes care of Matthew for the day. He draws on the bonding time he had with his own grandfather to make a special new memory. The cowboys put their steakhouse dreams on the line to recruit a business partner and are confronted with their next steps: developing a full menu and creating a “pop-up” restaurant.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E19 Face of Yesterday Lucas thinks he has seen a ghost when he comes face-to-face with Simon Lee, a young man who looks exactly like a Confederate officer he killed during the Civil War. Simon Lee is fast with a gun, and provokes Lucas into a life and death situation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E22 Closer Than a Brother Marshal Micah Torrance loses his confidence in his job of authority and begins drinking again after an old enemy from the past terrorizes him. When Lucas learns of the situation, he invites the man to North Fork and convinces Micah to face his fears.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E6 Fool's Gold After discovering a river filled with gold, Jim Bridger and his fellow trappers believe they are near El Dorado, the mythical Spanish city of gold. But their insatiable greed turns friends into enemies and puts Bridger at risk of a gruesome fate.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E5 A Prince on the Prairie While guiding a hunting expedition, Jim Bridger must deal with an arrogant foreign prince who is abusing his servant boy. But the tables soon turn, when it's the prince who needs rescuing, and his only hope is the long-suffering servant boy.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E10 The Discoveries of George McJunkin After a devastating storm, ranch foreman George McJunkin finds ancient bison fossils and flint points unearthed in a riverbank, and he sets out to find someone in the scientific community who will acknowledge the importance of his discovery.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E7 Calamity Jane Saves the Day Throughout Deadwood, Calamity Jane is known as a hot-tempered drunk. But when a deadly smallpox outbreak spreads through town, Calamity Jane works tirelessly to save the lives of the infected citizens who once treated her with such contempt.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E2 William Bartram: America's First Great Naturalist Naturalist William Bartram explores the unmapped regions of the South to document the native fauna and flora. After surviving many encounters with Native Americans and wildlife, it's an invisible virus that may finally end the journey and his life.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S2 E4 Who's the Cowboss? Now down to ten cowboys, the competition continues with an all-new immunity challenge that focuses on a whole different aspect of cowboyin' — business acumen. programme.desc: S3 E1 Trail of Hate Three bank robbers come to the McCain Ranch and force Lucas into helping them rob the North Fork Bank. One robber stays behind to guard Mark while the other two take Lucas to town. They threaten to kill Mark, unless Lucas cooperates with the gunmen.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E3 Seven A prison wagon carrying seven criminals stops in North Fork for supplies. The men escape, barricade themselves in the North Fork Saloon, and take saloon owner, Frank Sweeney, hostage. Lucas must act quickly to save Sweeney and the town from harm.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E4 The Pitchman A fast-talking con man and his teenage son stop at Lucas McCain's Ranch and try to talk their way into securing the mineral rights. However, the plan backfires when they discover the gold they thought was on the property is actually fool's gold.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E8 Pocketful of Stars In order to bypass sacred Shoshone burial grounds, Cheyenne scouts land for the railroad. Cheyenne's deal doesn't satisfy the railroad foreman and others. They try to eliminate him by any means possible, including using a Chinese girl to poison him.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E9 The Vanishing Breed Appointed to fill an empty seat in the senate, Cheyenne starts a campaign to preserve the American bison after a tragic buffalo stampede. He soon discovers that politics is really not his strong suit and should return as a gunfighter.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S3 E5 True Grits The cowboys are more at home on the range than behind a desk, so when lost paperwork results in lost income, they agree that they need to lasso in some secretarial help. Bubba’s back injury might keep him out of the saddle, but nothing can stop him from galloping ahead with making Andie’s first birthday unforgettable with a secret surprise. Booger jumps at the chance to rebuild his family legacy by buying back his granddaddy’s land, but is discouraged when his high-emotion offer is too low for the sellers. While Cody is eager to wow potential restaurant partners, his black-eyed peas—and just about everything else the guys dish up—get a big thumbs down from two chefs, threatening their plans for a pop-up steakhouse.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S3 E6 Man Up The cowboys team up to wrangle dangerous long-horned cattle for a fellow rancher. Working with Bubba’s feisty new colt, Booger schools his over-confident apprentice on the skills of training horses. The steakhouse plans gallop ahead with the cowboys taking lessons to learn more about the industry. Cody polishes his etiquette and studies the proper way to set a table, Bubba becomes “Chef Thompson” after a professional cook turns up the heat in the kitchen, and Booger partners with a butcher to sharpen his knowledge of beef. When their equipment fails, Cody and Misty unload new cow pens the old-fashioned way. When he gets the okay from his chiropractor, a relieved Bubba jumps back on his horse and rides off into the sunset with Kaley.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E20 The Wyoming Story Part 1 After Lucas' herd is wiped out by disease, he takes a job as an undercover agent for the U.S. government to raise money for new cattle. He travels to Wyoming to learn how renegade Cheyenne Indians are getting rifles illegally.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E21 The Wyoming Story Part 2 Lucas continues his investigation in Wyoming and makes contact with the local Indian agent, the source of the illegal gun-running operation. However, Lucas' life is put in danger when the town drunk reveals his true identity.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E7 Molly's Choice A young Jim Bridger helps a Shoshone woman escape the clutches of her abusive husband. As Bridger squares off against the frontier ruffian and his henchmen, he soon realizes that the woman he is helping is none other than the legendary Sacajawea.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Snakeroot Cure When a young girl is bitten by a rattlesnake, mountain man Jim Bridger finds himself in a race against time to save her arm and keep her alive as he desperately searches the wilderness for a medicinal plant that once saved the life of his friend.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E13 The Four Dead in Five Seconds Gunfight After two Mexican vaqueros cross the border in search of their stolen cattle, they are gunned down by the rustlers. When El Paso's newly appointed marshal arrests local ranch hands for the murders, he sparks one of the West's most infamous gunfights.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E5 The Gold Rush Detectives When gold goes missing from a safe in a remote mining town, Wells Fargo sends detectives Henry Johnson and Isaiah Lees to hunt down the culprits. Though the two men couldn't be more different, they must learn to work together to crack the case.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E3 Daniel Boone: Cunning Woodsman Legendary frontiersman Daniel Boone faces the biggest challenge of his life when the Shawnee take him prisoner. He must find a way to escape and travel 160 miles through hostile territory to warn Boonesborough, and his family, of a looming attack.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S2 E5 Snakes in the Grass With only eight cowboys left, the competition is neck-and-neck, and everyone has their eyes set on the immunity buckle. The immunity challenge tests their speed and control on horseback in a tournament-style battle, and they go head-to-head until only one remains. Two teammates, who have had it out for each other from the start, decide to set their differences aside for the team's greater good, and to their surprise, they work well together. In the elimination challenge, each team has to sort a herd of cattle by their ear tag colors and drive them into three separate corrals. The blue team comes together to implement a strategy that proves to be effective. The green team makes a risky decision that could cost them the challenge. During elimination, a contestant throws their biggest rival under the bus yet again. Trace sends another cowboy packing.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E10 A Tiger's Tale Cody and Noah have the huge task of delivering a tiger to St. Joseph, Missouri, while protecting two nuns and a young lady named Elizabeth. Cody soon falls for Elizabeth. Soon trouble arises when they must fight off hunters wanting the tiger's hide.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E5 Strange Town Prisoner Bletch Droshek escapes from Marshal Micah Torrance, and leaves him beaten on a barbed-wire fence. Torrance stumbles to the McCain Ranch and deputizes Lucas to apprehend Droshek at a mining camp run by his brother.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E6 Baranca A Mexican bandit named Baranca and his gang ride into North Fork looking for Bro Hadley, who murdered a Mexican farmer and burned down his home. Baranca finds Hadley and intends to get justice by executing him. However, Lucas intervenes just in time.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E7 The Martinet Cavalry Captain Josiah Perry, a disciplined military man, learns his son, Lon, died in a North Fork gunfight with Lucas. Perry is bent on making Lucas pay for Lon's death. Perry's other son, Ben, tries to keep his dad from facing the same fate.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E8 Miss Milly A young, naive woman who doesn't have any business experience comes to North Fork and purchases the general store from Hattie Denton. A newcomer and his partner con her by posing as collection agents, putting the town's citizens in danger.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E10 Vengeance Is Mine Cheyenne is the interim sheriff for the town of Gunnison. He quickly learns that his old friend Ray Masters wants revenge on Rod Delaplane due to a previous debt. Cheyenne must go to extreme measures to avoid tragedy.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E11 Johnny Brassbuttons Scout Johnny Brassbuttons leads a wagon train, including a widow and her companion, to meet a stagecoach in Globe. Although they have permission to travel through Apache land, disaster strikes when Indians ambush them.

programme.desc: S3 E5 True Grits The cowboys are more at home on the range than behind a desk, so when lost paperwork results in lost income, they agree that they need to lasso in some secretarial help. programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E11 Johnny Brassbuttons Scout Johnny Brassbuttons leads a wagon train, including a widow and her companion, to meet a stagecoach in Globe. Although they have permission to travel through Apache land, disaster strikes when Indians ambush them.

programme.title: The Big Trees
programme.desc: A timber baron plans to take advantage of a new law and make millions. Making his money turns out to be harder than he ever thought when the Quakers who own the land refuse to sell their precious trees.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E23 The Lost Treasure of Canyon Town On the way home to North Fork, Lucas, Micah, and Mark take a detour to Micah's hometown. A thriving mining town years ago, it is now a ghost town except for Mr. Newman and his son who still live there. Something is amiss, and a mystery is revealed.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E24 Dark Day at North Fork While hauling dynamite, Lucas accidentally creates a spark, leading to an explosion. He is blinded and Doc Burrage isn't sure if he will regain his sight. When an enemy from Lucas' past shows up in town, he is in danger, as the man aims to kill him.

programme.title: Legends of the Stagecoach
programme.desc: A marvel of engineering, the iconic stagecoach becomes indispensable when Americans settle the West. As stagecoaches and their heroic drivers navigate perilous trails to transport passengers and valuables, they are easy targets for lawless bandits.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E4 Burton Mossman Crosses the Line After failing to capture the ruthless murderer Augustine Chacon on U.S. soil, Arizona Ranger Burton Mossman relinquishes his badge to cross the border. In Mexico, he goes undercover as a horse thief to join Chacon's gang and spring his trap.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E6 Sister Blandina and the Killer When a bloodthirsty mob storms a jailhouse holding a man accused of attempted murder, they are confronted by a 22-year-old missionary from the Sisters of Charity. Only Sister Blandina can stop the vigilantes from taking the law into their own hands.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E1 Joe Meek: A Fearless Fighter Already a seasoned mountain man, Joe Meek has a reputation for raw courage and bravery among the trappers of the west. But Meek becomes a frontier legend when he risks his life in a fearless charge to save the woman that he loves from Crow warriors.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S2 E6 Showdown at the Arena Only seven cowboys remain, eager for the chance to prove they can win it all. The immunity challenge examines each cowboy’s patience and control in a point system challenge. The contestant with the highest score won't have to sweat the next elimination round. When it looks like it might come down to a tie, the last cowboy to ride prevails. In the two-part elimination challenge, the contestants must gather and load a herd into a trailer before racing off to a neighboring field where they must doctor a few yearlings in open pasture. The green team starts strong, but a few wrong moves have major repercussions. On the blue team, a cowboy takes the lead, curious to see if his teammate will sink or swim under pressure. The elimination comes down to two rivals who don't hold back when it comes to letting Trace know why the other should go home. In the end, Trace sends the cowboy whose heart doesn't seem to be in it to win it, but they don't go quietly.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E11 Good Night Sweet Charlotte Charlotte, an old friend of Lou's, comes to Rock Creek and stirs up bad memories of a man who had hurt them both. Lou distances herself from Kid, but when Charlotte turns up dead, Lou confronts her past. Meanwhile, Jimmy befriends a Lakota Indian.

programme.title: McLintock!
programme.desc: A cattle baron awaits the return of his daughter from school and is surprised that his wife has returned to take their daughter away. He tries to keep the peace and do what is best for everyone.

programme.title: Kansas Pacific
programme.desc: With talks of a Civil War brewing, Southern saboteurs know they must keep Northern forces from using the U.S. train system. They devise a daring and dangerous plan to stop and capture a railroad engine, preventing the completion of a railroad line.

programme.title: The Big Trees
programme.desc: A timber baron plans to take advantage of a new law and make millions. Making his money turns out to be harder than he ever thought when the Quakers who own the land refuse to sell their precious trees.

programme.desc: S3 E23 The Lost Treasure of Canyon Town On the way home to North Fork, Lucas, Micah, and Mark take a detour to Micah's hometown. programme.title: McLintock!
programme.desc: A cattle baron awaits the return of his daughter from school and is surprised that his wife has returned to take their daughter away. He tries to keep the peace and do what is best for everyone.

programme.title: County Line
programme.desc: When his best friend, Sheriff Clint Thorne (Jeff Fahey, Texas Rising, Justified), is brutally gunned down, former neighboring county sheriff, Alden Rockwell (Tom Wopat, The Dukes Of Hazzard, Longmire) is left with many questions and no answers. After the investigation stalls and his replacement, Sheriff Preston (Grant Goodeve, Eight is Enough, Dynasty) turns a blind eye, Alden takes the case into his own hands. Uncovering a web of crime, deceit, and corruption that spreads through two counties, Alden is caught in a deadly criminal network with no backup, no badge, and local diner owner, Maddie (Patricia Richardson, Home Improvement, The West Wing) as his only ally. Seeking justice at any cost, Alden must find out who's behind this criminal enterprise, even if some lines must be crossed.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E5 The Journey Back Mark takes a job on new neighbor Will Temple's ranch but is taken back by Temple's badly scarred face. When a cavalry officer stops by the McCain Ranch looking for a deserter who committed murder, both Mark and Lucas question who Temple really is.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E6 The Decision While repairing a fence on his property, Lucas witnesses a murder. The killer, Corey Hazlett, is the son of a wealthy rancher named Frank Hazlett. When Lucas agrees to testify at Corey's trial, there are threats to harm Mark.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E7 Knight Errant Two old friends of Lucas', Don Chumera De Lardo and Colonel Black, come to the McCain Ranch. They are there to finish a deed of honor, even insisting on a jousting match. Lucas learns that the feud started over a chess game.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E8 Honest Abe A neighbor of Lucas' believes he is Abe Lincoln after being mentally injured in the Civil War. Townspeople go along with his impersonation since he is a kind man. However, when a saloon patron makes fun of him, trouble ensues.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E7 George Croghan: Frontier Peacemaker When Chief Pontiac organizes a coalition of Native American tribes to attack British forts, frontier trader George Croghan risks his life on a perilous journey into the wilderness to find Pontiac, negotiate a peace agreement, and prevent all-out war.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E12 The Hunt for Outlaw Bill Doolin When notorious outlaw Bill Doolin escapes from jail, the U.S. Marshals Service springs into action to end his four-year crime spree. Known as the “Three Guardsmen,” Deputy U.S. Marshals Heck Thomas, Bill Tilghman, and Chris Madsen have a reputation for always getting their man, but they know it won’t be easy with Doolin. Doolin is no ordinary outlaw: as a former member of The Dalton Gang and the mastermind of The Wild Bunch, he has successfully robbed banks, trains, and stagecoaches. After months of tracking Doolin, Heck Thomas is so close he barely stops to eat or sleep. When Thomas and his posse finally corner Doolin, he refuses to surrender, and gunfire is the only way out. Some years later, Bat Masterson, former-gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, catches up with Bill Tilghman to hear the real story behind the hunt for the outlaw Bill Doolin.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E13 Stagecoach Mary While working as a groundskeeper at a convent in Ohio, former slave Mary Fields forms a deep friendship with the superior, Mother Amadeus Dunne. When Mother Amadeus falls ill after traveling to Montana to open a girls’ school, Mary rushes to her rescue and nurses her back to health. Mary soon discovers that the Western Frontier satisfies her free-spirited nature, and she decides to stay in Montana for good. She secures a contract to deliver mail by stagecoach for the U.S. Postal Service, becoming the first African American woman to carry mail. With a fearless attitude and multiple firearms, she protects the mail from would-be bandits and is soon known far and wide. Some years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson meets Sister Amadeus and gets the true story of “Stagecoach Mary.”.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S5 E3 Road to Three Graves Cheyenne helps his friend Tuk deliver equipment across private property to a mine. However, they run into major problems when they encounter a detestable landowner who wants the equipment for himself.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E7 Panic Lucas and Mark find a young couple in a wagon who are suffering from a fever. Lucas takes them to his ranch where a doctor confirms it to be yellow fever. No-good Brett Conway spreads the word in North Fork and panic sets in.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E8 Ordeal Lucas and Mark travel through the desert to get a supply of salt when a rattlesnake spooks their horses, causing the wagon to overturn. A horse must be put down due to injury and Lucas is also badly hurt. Mark has no choice but to go for help alone.

programme.title: Sitting Bull
programme.desc: A U.S. Cavalry officer begins to understand the plight of the Sioux and arranges a meeting between Chief Sitting Bull and President Grant.

programme.title: Once Upon a Texas Train
programme.desc: An outlaw and a Texas Ranger have a life-long personal feud, but now, as grumpy older men, they must put their differences aside and face a common problem - a young gang of outlaws ravaging Texas.

She secures a contract to deliver mail by stagecoach for the U.S. Postal Service, becoming the first African American woman to carry mail. programme.desc: S5 E3 Road to Three Graves Cheyenne helps his friend Tuk deliver equipment across private property to a mine. However, they run into major problems when they encounter a detestable landowner who wants the equipment for himself.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E7 Panic Lucas and Mark find a young couple in a wagon who are suffering from a fever. Lucas takes them to his ranch where a doctor confirms it to be yellow fever. No-good Brett Conway spreads the word in North Fork and panic sets in.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E8 Ordeal Lucas and Mark travel through the desert to get a supply of salt when a rattlesnake spooks their horses, causing the wagon to overturn. A horse must be put down due to injury and Lucas is also badly hurt. Mark has no choice but to go for help alone.

programme.title: Sitting Bull
programme.desc: A U.S. Cavalry officer begins to understand the plight of the Sioux and arranges a meeting between Chief Sitting Bull and President Grant.

programme.title: Once Upon a Texas Train
programme.desc: An outlaw and a Texas Ranger have a life-long personal feud, but now, as grumpy older men, they must put their differences aside and face a common problem - a young gang of outlaws ravaging Texas.

programme.title: The Warrant
programme.desc: Sheriff John Breaker and his son, Cal, reunite after the Civil War to track down a fellow veteran, now a notorious gang leader. Their mission turns dangerous when they find themselves caught between their former friend’s outlaw gang and the vigilantes who are taking the law into their own hands. Starring Neal McDonough (Yellowstone, Captain America), Casper Van Dien (Starship Troopers, Tarzan), Steven R. McQueen (The Vampire Diaries, Chicago Fire), and Annabeth Gish (X-Files, The Haunting of Hill House).

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E19 The Noble Chase Jimmy teams up with his rival, Jake Colter, to hunt down Lon Chase, a bank robber with a heart of gold that has a high price on his head. Chase ultimately convinces them that he had to do it in order to stop illegal activity.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E5 Death Never Rides Alone A former gunfighter comes to North Fork with the intention of settling down and starting a new life. Many resent him but Lucas helps him. However, outlaws come to town and threaten to cause trouble with the retired gunman.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E6 I Take This Woman Irishman Dennis O'Flarrety arrives in North Fork and announces he is there to marry Lou Mallory. Years ago, Lou's father promised her hand to O'Flarrety in marriage. Lou, however, doesn't seem to like him, and her reasons are soon revealed.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E5 The Real Lone Star Ranger When young Texas Ranger Ira Aten is having trouble hunting down a ruthless outlaw, he enlists the help of John Hughes, an aloof rancher with an uncanny talent for tracking bad guys. The two men form an unlikely and unexpected bond while traversing the dusty path toward justice. With Hughes’ guidance, Aten finally catches up to the outlaw and ends his reign of terror. Along the way, Hughes decides to become a Ranger himself and transforms from loner to lawman. Hughes’ adventure with Aten is just the first chapter of a storied career that inspires the popular novel, The Lone Star Ranger. Some years later, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews Aten years later to uncover the real story of the Lone Star Ranger and separate the truth from the fiction.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E6 Bass Reeves: Trailblazing Lawman After escaping the bonds of slavery, Bass Reeves takes refuge among the indigenous people of The Indian Territory, where he is welcomed into their culture. When the Civil War ends, his new-found tracking skills and fluency in native languages lead to his appointment as the first Black Deputy U.S. Marshal west of the Mississippi River. Though he faces discrimination from his peers, Reeves earns their respect when he accepts Judge Isaac Parker’s daunting order to hunt down one of the most ruthless killers in The Indian Territory and bring him back dead or alive. Some years later, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews Judge Parker to learn more about the amazing career of Bass Reeves, who goes on to arrest 3,000 felons, kill 14 men in self-defense, and complete 32 years of service without being wounded.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E1 They Killed Me Frontiersman Jim Bridger spins an incredible tale to a group of settlers, claiming he was once killed by Blackfeet warriors yet somehow lived to tell the tale. They think he's joking, but Bridger soon proves that he really did rise from the dead.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E4 Brothers in Arms When they are ambushed by a Blackfeet war party, Jim Bridger and a lone Shoshone brave must work together to find a way to defeat their common enemy. If they can't overcome their suspicions and learn to trust each other, they may not survive the day.

programme.title: Blue Ridge
programme.desc: Ex-Green Beret, Justin Wise, trades in his life of danger for a sheriff badge in a sleepy town at the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Now closer to his ex-wife and daughter, he's ready to settle down and embrace a life without chaos. But trouble has a way of following him. Just when he starts getting adjusted to the simple life, a murder in the community puts the residents on edge and refuels a longtime feud between two of the most powerful families. As Justin and his deputies work the case, he realizes there is more to his new home than meets the eye. Secrets unfold, and motives emerge, leading Justin on a race against time to solve the case before the townspeople take the law into their own hands.

programme.title: Concrete Cowboys
programme.desc: When two lively cowboys from Montana are set up by a crooked sheriff, they wind up on the run. After arriving in Nashville, the two open a detective agency together and are soon hired to prevent the kidnapping of a country singer.

programme.title: Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: A Colorado rancher contends with his two sons, one biological and the other adopted, who are fighting over control of the massive family property. Which brother will come out on top in this family battle for cash and cattle?

programme.title: The Warrant
programme.desc: Sheriff John Breaker and his son, Cal, reunite after the Civil War to track down a fellow veteran, now a notorious gang leader. programme.desc: The FBI's raid of Donald Trump's Mar-a-Lago created controversy; Rob Schmitt looks at the issues.

programme.title: The Trump Wars
programme.desc: Collusion Delusion Investigations try to prove Trump's campaign colluded with Russia, but the president hits back against the "collusion delusion" and wins.

programme.title: Stand Up Trump: Making America Fun Again: Draining the Swamp
programme.desc: Donald Trump may have taken many by surprise with his unlikely win of the 2016 presidential election.

programme.title: Rob Carson's What in the World?
programme.desc: Rob Carson dissects politics, cultural phenomena and the absurdity confronting America with humor and satire.

programme.title: The Big Focus
programme.desc: John Bachman focuses on the biggest news from D.C., N.Y., and around America.

programme.title: The Chris Salcedo Weekend
programme.desc: Conservative, liberty-loving host Chris Salcedo hits press bias and both political parties.

programme.title: Rob Schmitt This Week
programme.desc: Rob Schmitt wraps up all the latest news and opinion, and sets the stage for tomorrow.

programme.title: Newsmax News In-Depth
programme.desc: Bianca de la Garza looks at the big stories of the week, politics, policy, the economy and much more.

programme.desc: The Freedom File: Judge Napolitano.

programme.title: Carl Higbie This Week
programme.desc: Carl Higbie gives common-sense news analysis, exposes big government and media bias, as he fights for American values.

programme.title: Finnerty

programme.title: Cops Under Fire
programme.desc: Crime and killings are sweeping the nation and Chicago is ground zero; a street cop discusses the state of crime in America and on the streets.

programme.title: Invasion: Border Crisis, Rob Schmitt Reports
programme.desc: Rob Schmitt hosts a special on the crisis at America's Southern border, with exclusive access and a never-before-seen look at the efforts to keep the country safe.

programme.title: Jerusalem: From Truman to Trump
programme.desc: An examination of the strategic and geographic importance of the Holy Land, the impact it has had on U.S. presidents, and their role in Israel's foundation and the establishment of Jerusalem as its capital city.

programme.title: The Abraham Accords: Pres. Trump Talks to Jon Voight
programme.desc: Famed actor Jon Voight talks to Donald Trump on his historic "Abraham Accords" and modern Israel's history.

programme.title: Newsfront
programme.desc: Antisemitism in America The normalization of antisemitism in America by politicians and public figures leads to unprecedented attacks against the Jewish community.

programme.title: Alien Encounters: Roswell
programme.desc: Examining mysteries surrounding claims that an alien spacecraft crashed near Roswell, N.M., in 1947.

programme.title: Elton John: Becoming Rocketman
programme.desc: Exploring the career of Elton John, one of the most successful musicians of the past century.

programme.title: Woke America

programme.desc: During the Civil War, Union forces stationed in Colorado are hampered by raiders who have been stealing their horses as they travel through the mountains. When several commanding officers begin to suspect a traitor is revealing troop movements, Maj. Lex Kearny (Gary Cooper) goes undercover to investigate. However, the assignment strains Kearny's relationship with his wife, Erin (Phyllis Thaxter), after he chooses to continue the operation instead of searching for their runaway son.

programme.title: More Dead Than Alive
programme.desc: An outlaw responsible for many deaths, Cain (Clint Walker) is released from prison after years behind bars. Despite his earlier wicked ways, Cain has made a real effort to reform and just wants to be left in peace. Unfortunately, his reputation limits his employment options, and he's left with no choice except becoming a performer in a Wild West show. Working for promoter Dan Ruffalo (Vincent Price), Cain attempts to lead a relatively quiet life, but other gunslingers are still out to get him.

programme.title: The Comancheros
programme.desc: After his partner is killed, aging Texas Ranger Jake Cutter (John Wayne) is assigned to capture gambler Paul Regret (Stuart Whitman), a condemned prisoner who managed to escape hanging, and return him to Louisiana to face his sentence. But once Cutter has him in custody, they encounter the Comancheros, a fierce band of outlaws providing guns and booze to the Comanches, and are forced to work together to stop them. When Regret proves his worth in the fight, Cutter begins to reevaluate his duties.

programme.desc: Movies about ghosts are not always scary. Sometimes they're romantic like Ghost, friendly like Casper, funny like Beetlejuice, or chilling like The Sixth Sense. Gather as our hosts discuss some of their favorite spirited tales.

programme.title: Reviewish
programme.desc: Few jobs are harder than adapting a musical from stage to screen. For every hit like West Side Story, there's a miss like Rock of Ages. Our hosts look at the best and worst adaptations, including Cabaret, Chicago, and Fiddler on the Roof.

programme.title: Air, Land and Sea
programme.desc: Uncovering the history of the Jewish people in Portugal's Southern Regions of Alentejo and the Algarve, in the cities of Evora, Monsaraz and Faro; hosted by Brad Pomerance.

programme.title: Air, Land and Sea
programme.desc: Discussion of the rich Jewish history that can be found on the Caribbean island.

programme.title: Air, Land and Sea
programme.desc: The history of the pioneering Jews who helped the Caribbean Island of Nevis to thrive.

programme.title: Bubbies Know Best

programme.title: Bubbies Know Best

programme.title: Banded

programme.title: Fauda
programme.desc: After retiring from the Israel Defense Force, Doron is working on a vineyard. He gets roped back into active duty, though, upon learning that an enemy who Doron thought his unit had killed is still alive and plans on attending his brother's wedding. Doron rejoins the IDF team with the intention of going under cover at the wedding, but the plan goes awry when the team's cover is blown. That sets into motion a chaotic chain of events and leads IDF into a manhunt to locate and kill the squad's target.

programme.title: Prisoners of War
programme.desc: Two soldiers try to readjust to normal life after 17 years in captivity.

programme.title: Vision of the Bible
programme.desc: Emilio Roso takes a journey through the Book of Matthew, exploring the sights and sounds of the Holy Land; the Story of Jesus Christ from his birth to his ministry, crucifixion and resurrection.

programme.title: You Bet Your Life
programme.desc: Groucho Marx hosts a question-and-answer game show.

programme.title: The Jack Benny Program
programme.desc: The comedian provides laughs with a series of guest stars.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright is the patriarch of an all-male Nevada ranching family. Set during and after the Civil War, "Bonanza" is the story of life on the family's thousand-acre spread, known as the Ponderosa, near Virginia City. Ben has his three sons, each with a different (and deceased) mother. Serious eldest son Adam hopes to follow in his father's footsteps; middle son Hoss is a gentle giant -- physically strong, but sometimes naive; and youngest son Little Joe is the most impetuous and romantic of the offspring.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: The suspenseful tales of the Old West's famous sharp shooter.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Railroad detective Matt Clark solves mysteries with his assistant.

programme.title: Bodies in Motion With Gilad
programme.desc: Israeli exercise guru Gilad Janklowicz and his team exercise on the beaches of Hawaii.

programme.title: Total Body Sculpt With Gilad
programme.desc: Gilad Janklowicz combines several types of exercise into one workout routine, including strength and circuit training, cardio, kickboxing, and martial arts. programme.title: Bodies in Motion With Gilad
programme.desc: Israeli exercise guru Gilad Janklowicz and his team exercise on the beaches of Hawaii.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S2 E4 Who's the Cowboss? Now down to ten cowboys, the competition continues with an all-new immunity challenge that focuses on a whole different aspect of cowboyin' — business acumen. The contestants must prove they know the cattle market by estimating the value of various livestock at auction. Trace asks the contestants to continue to train the colts from the last elimination challenge, but they struggle to develop a plan that will work for everyone. The elimination challenge tests the contestants' team strategy, roping, and speed. Each team has forty-five minutes to collect fifteen gold ear tags from mixed herds in two different pastures. Frustrations build when the green team has trouble with the pens, and a cow escapes during the blue team's run. As the competition intensifies, one cowboy tries to get rid of his biggest competition. Unimpressed by how the teams handled the challenge, Trace shakes things up by sending two cowboys home.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E9 Spirits Rachel falls for a military division agent who has a drinking problem. When his issues start affecting her, Rachel reveals that she's had a problem with alcohol in the past. Meanwhile, with Teaspoon and other riders away, Noah heads a slim crew.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E1 Trail of Hate Three bank robbers come to the McCain Ranch and force Lucas into helping them rob the North Fork Bank. One robber stays behind to guard Mark while the other two take Lucas to town. They threaten to kill Mark, unless Lucas cooperates with the gunmen.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E2 Woman from Hog Ridge When Lucas and Mark catch two young men stealing a horse, Lucas is forced into a shootout. He captures one of the men, but Ma Boyle's son is killed in the gunfight. Soon after the killing, the Boyle clan comes to hang the person responsible.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E3 Seven A prison wagon carrying seven criminals stops in North Fork for supplies. The men escape, barricade themselves in the North Fork Saloon, and take saloon owner, Frank Sweeney, hostage. Lucas must act quickly to save Sweeney and the town from harm.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E4 The Pitchman A fast-talking con man and his teenage son stop at Lucas McCain's Ranch and try to talk their way into securing the mineral rights. However, the plan backfires when they discover the gold they thought was on the property is actually fool's gold.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E8 Pocketful of Stars In order to bypass sacred Shoshone burial grounds, Cheyenne scouts land for the railroad. Cheyenne's deal doesn't satisfy the railroad foreman and others. They try to eliminate him by any means possible, including using a Chinese girl to poison him.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E9 The Vanishing Breed Appointed to fill an empty seat in the senate, Cheyenne starts a campaign to preserve the American bison after a tragic buffalo stampede. He soon discovers that politics is really not his strong suit and should return as a gunfighter.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S3 E3 Man Down! Bubba’s back in the saddle with the guys when his horse bucks and throws him on a bone-breaking fall, fractures his cowboy spirit and immobilizes his work with the cattle company. Booger enlists a bullfighter to help him wrangle his ornery Brahman cattle, and considers whether or not he has enough land to maintain the growing herd. Misty gives Cody a gift from the heart that captures both their past as a couple and honors their growing family legacy as ranchers. The guys pitch each other competing ideas for their future steakhouse, and Cody’s brainstorm stands out as the one with true cowboy vision... including a name for their venture.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S3 E4 Filet of Dreams Bubba’s in a pinch when Cody urges him to ease his aching back with acupuncture. Cody and Misty have to find out why their herd is losing so many stillborn calves before it threatens their new business. Booger discovers the ups and downs of “daddy duty” when he takes care of Matthew for the day. He draws on the bonding time he had with his own grandfather to make a special new memory. The cowboys put their steakhouse dreams on the line to recruit a business partner and are confronted with their next steps: developing a full menu and creating a “pop-up” restaurant.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E19 Face of Yesterday Lucas thinks he has seen a ghost when he comes face-to-face with Simon Lee, a young man who looks exactly like a Confederate officer he killed during the Civil War. Simon Lee is fast with a gun, and provokes Lucas into a life and death situation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E22 Closer Than a Brother Marshal Micah Torrance loses his confidence in his job of authority and begins drinking again after an old enemy from the past terrorizes him. When Lucas learns of the situation, he invites the man to North Fork and convinces Micah to face his fears.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E6 Fool's Gold After discovering a river filled with gold, Jim Bridger and his fellow trappers believe they are near El Dorado, the mythical Spanish city of gold. But their insatiable greed turns friends into enemies and puts Bridger at risk of a gruesome fate.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E5 A Prince on the Prairie While guiding a hunting expedition, Jim Bridger must deal with an arrogant foreign prince who is abusing his servant boy. But the tables soon turn, when it's the prince who needs rescuing, and his only hope is the long-suffering servant boy.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E10 The Discoveries of George McJunkin After a devastating storm, ranch foreman George McJunkin finds ancient bison fossils and flint points unearthed in a riverbank, and he sets out to find someone in the scientific community who will acknowledge the importance of his discovery.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E7 Calamity Jane Saves the Day Throughout Deadwood, Calamity Jane is known as a hot-tempered drunk. But when a deadly smallpox outbreak spreads through town, Calamity Jane works tirelessly to save the lives of the infected citizens who once treated her with such contempt.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E2 William Bartram: America's First Great Naturalist Naturalist William Bartram explores the unmapped regions of the South to document the native fauna and flora. After surviving many encounters with Native Americans and wildlife, it's an invisible virus that may finally end the journey and his life.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S2 E4 Who's the Cowboss? Now down to ten cowboys, the competition continues with an all-new immunity challenge that focuses on a whole different aspect of cowboyin' — business acumen. The contestants must prove they know the cattle market by estimating the value of various livestock at auction. programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E3 Seven A prison wagon carrying seven criminals stops in North Fork for supplies. The men escape, barricade themselves in the North Fork Saloon, and take saloon owner, Frank Sweeney, hostage. Lucas must act quickly to save Sweeney and the town from harm.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E4 The Pitchman A fast-talking con man and his teenage son stop at Lucas McCain's Ranch and try to talk their way into securing the mineral rights. However, the plan backfires when they discover the gold they thought was on the property is actually fool's gold.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E8 Pocketful of Stars In order to bypass sacred Shoshone burial grounds, Cheyenne scouts land for the railroad. Cheyenne's deal doesn't satisfy the railroad foreman and others. They try to eliminate him by any means possible, including using a Chinese girl to poison him.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E9 The Vanishing Breed Appointed to fill an empty seat in the senate, Cheyenne starts a campaign to preserve the American bison after a tragic buffalo stampede. He soon discovers that politics is really not his strong suit and should return as a gunfighter.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S3 E5 True Grits The cowboys are more at home on the range than behind a desk, so when lost paperwork results in lost income, they agree that they need to lasso in some secretarial help. Bubba’s back injury might keep him out of the saddle, but nothing can stop him from galloping ahead with making Andie’s first birthday unforgettable with a secret surprise. Booger jumps at the chance to rebuild his family legacy by buying back his granddaddy’s land, but is discouraged when his high-emotion offer is too low for the sellers. While Cody is eager to wow potential restaurant partners, his black-eyed peas—and just about everything else the guys dish up—get a big thumbs down from two chefs, threatening their plans for a pop-up steakhouse.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S3 E6 Man Up The cowboys team up to wrangle dangerous long-horned cattle for a fellow rancher. Working with Bubba’s feisty new colt, Booger schools his over-confident apprentice on the skills of training horses. The steakhouse plans gallop ahead with the cowboys taking lessons to learn more about the industry. Cody polishes his etiquette and studies the proper way to set a table, Bubba becomes “Chef Thompson” after a professional cook turns up the heat in the kitchen, and Booger partners with a butcher to sharpen his knowledge of beef. When their equipment fails, Cody and Misty unload new cow pens the old-fashioned way. When he gets the okay from his chiropractor, a relieved Bubba jumps back on his horse and rides off into the sunset with Kaley.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E20 The Wyoming Story Part 1 After Lucas' herd is wiped out by disease, he takes a job as an undercover agent for the U.S. government to raise money for new cattle. He travels to Wyoming to learn how renegade Cheyenne Indians are getting rifles illegally.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E21 The Wyoming Story Part 2 Lucas continues his investigation in Wyoming and makes contact with the local Indian agent, the source of the illegal gun-running operation. However, Lucas' life is put in danger when the town drunk reveals his true identity.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E7 Molly's Choice A young Jim Bridger helps a Shoshone woman escape the clutches of her abusive husband. As Bridger squares off against the frontier ruffian and his henchmen, he soon realizes that the woman he is helping is none other than the legendary Sacajawea.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Snakeroot Cure When a young girl is bitten by a rattlesnake, mountain man Jim Bridger finds himself in a race against time to save her arm and keep her alive as he desperately searches the wilderness for a medicinal plant that once saved the life of his friend.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E13 The Four Dead in Five Seconds Gunfight After two Mexican vaqueros cross the border in search of their stolen cattle, they are gunned down by the rustlers. When El Paso's newly appointed marshal arrests local ranch hands for the murders, he sparks one of the West's most infamous gunfights.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E5 The Gold Rush Detectives When gold goes missing from a safe in a remote mining town, Wells Fargo sends detectives Henry Johnson and Isaiah Lees to hunt down the culprits. Though the two men couldn't be more different, they must learn to work together to crack the case.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E3 Daniel Boone: Cunning Woodsman Legendary frontiersman Daniel Boone faces the biggest challenge of his life when the Shawnee take him prisoner. He must find a way to escape and travel 160 miles through hostile territory to warn Boonesborough, and his family, of a looming attack.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S2 E5 Snakes in the Grass With only eight cowboys left, the competition is neck-and-neck, and everyone has their eyes set on the immunity buckle. The immunity challenge tests their speed and control on horseback in a tournament-style battle, and they go head-to-head until only one remains. Two teammates, who have had it out for each other from the start, decide to set their differences aside for the team's greater good, and to their surprise, they work well together. In the elimination challenge, each team has to sort a herd of cattle by their ear tag colors and drive them into three separate corrals. The blue team comes together to implement a strategy that proves to be effective. The green team makes a risky decision that could cost them the challenge. During elimination, a contestant throws their biggest rival under the bus yet again. Trace sends another cowboy packing.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E10 A Tiger's Tale Cody and Noah have the huge task of delivering a tiger to St. Joseph, Missouri, while protecting two nuns and a young lady named Elizabeth. Cody soon falls for Elizabeth. Soon trouble arises when they must fight off hunters wanting the tiger's hide.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E5 Strange Town Prisoner Bletch Droshek escapes from Marshal Micah Torrance, and leaves him beaten on a barbed-wire fence. Torrance stumbles to the McCain Ranch and deputizes Lucas to apprehend Droshek at a mining camp run by his brother.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E6 Baranca A Mexican bandit named Baranca and his gang ride into North Fork looking for Bro Hadley, who murdered a Mexican farmer and burned down his home. Baranca finds Hadley and intends to get justice by executing him. However, Lucas intervenes just in time.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E7 The Martinet Cavalry Captain Josiah Perry, a disciplined military man, learns his son, Lon, died in a North Fork gunfight with Lucas. Perry is bent on making Lucas pay for Lon's death. Perry's other son, Ben, tries to keep his dad from facing the same fate.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E8 Miss Milly A young, naive woman who doesn't have any business experience comes to North Fork and purchases the general store from Hattie Denton. A newcomer and his partner con her by posing as collection agents, putting the town's citizens in danger.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E10 Vengeance Is Mine Cheyenne is the interim sheriff for the town of Gunnison. He quickly learns that his old friend Ray Masters wants revenge on Rod Delaplane due to a previous debt. Cheyenne must go to extreme measures to avoid tragedy.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E11 Johnny Brassbuttons Scout Johnny Brassbuttons leads a wagon train, including a widow and her companion, to meet a stagecoach in Globe. Although they have permission to travel through Apache land, disaster strikes when Indians ambush them.

During elimination, a contestant throws their biggest rival under the bus yet again. Trace sends another cowboy packing.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E10 A Tiger's Tale Cody and Noah have the huge task of delivering a tiger to St. Joseph, Missouri, while protecting two nuns and a young lady named Elizabeth. Cody soon falls for Elizabeth. Soon trouble arises when they must fight off hunters wanting the tiger's hide.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E5 Strange Town Prisoner Bletch Droshek escapes from Marshal Micah Torrance, and leaves him beaten on a barbed-wire fence. Torrance stumbles to the McCain Ranch and deputizes Lucas to apprehend Droshek at a mining camp run by his brother.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E6 Baranca A Mexican bandit named Baranca and his gang ride into North Fork looking for Bro Hadley, who murdered a Mexican farmer and burned down his home. Baranca finds Hadley and intends to get justice by executing him. However, Lucas intervenes just in time.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E7 The Martinet Cavalry Captain Josiah Perry, a disciplined military man, learns his son, Lon, died in a North Fork gunfight with Lucas. Perry is bent on making Lucas pay for Lon's death. Perry's other son, Ben, tries to keep his dad from facing the same fate.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E8 Miss Milly A young, naive woman who doesn't have any business experience comes to North Fork and purchases the general store from Hattie Denton. A newcomer and his partner con her by posing as collection agents, putting the town's citizens in danger.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E10 Vengeance Is Mine Cheyenne is the interim sheriff for the town of Gunnison. He quickly learns that his old friend Ray Masters wants revenge on Rod Delaplane due to a previous debt. Cheyenne must go to extreme measures to avoid tragedy.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E11 Johnny Brassbuttons Scout Johnny Brassbuttons leads a wagon train, including a widow and her companion, to meet a stagecoach in Globe. Although they have permission to travel through Apache land, disaster strikes when Indians ambush them.

programme.title: The Big Trees
programme.desc: A timber baron plans to take advantage of a new law and make millions. Making his money turns out to be harder than he ever thought when the Quakers who own the land refuse to sell their precious trees.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E23 The Lost Treasure of Canyon Town On the way home to North Fork, Lucas, Micah, and Mark take a detour to Micah's hometown. A thriving mining town years ago, it is now a ghost town except for Mr. Newman and his son who still live there. Something is amiss, and a mystery is revealed.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E24 Dark Day at North Fork While hauling dynamite, Lucas accidentally creates a spark, leading to an explosion. He is blinded and Doc Burrage isn't sure if he will regain his sight. When an enemy from Lucas' past shows up in town, he is in danger, as the man aims to kill him.

programme.title: Legends of the Stagecoach
programme.desc: A marvel of engineering, the iconic stagecoach becomes indispensable when Americans settle the West. As stagecoaches and their heroic drivers navigate perilous trails to transport passengers and valuables, they are easy targets for lawless bandits.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E4 Burton Mossman Crosses the Line After failing to capture the ruthless murderer Augustine Chacon on U.S. soil, Arizona Ranger Burton Mossman relinquishes his badge to cross the border. In Mexico, he goes undercover as a horse thief to join Chacon's gang and spring his trap.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E6 Sister Blandina and the Killer When a bloodthirsty mob storms a jailhouse holding a man accused of attempted murder, they are confronted by a 22-year-old missionary from the Sisters of Charity. Only Sister Blandina can stop the vigilantes from taking the law into their own hands.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E1 Joe Meek: A Fearless Fighter Already a seasoned mountain man, Joe Meek has a reputation for raw courage and bravery among the trappers of the west. But Meek becomes a frontier legend when he risks his life in a fearless charge to save the woman that he loves from Crow warriors.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S2 E6 Showdown at the Arena Only seven cowboys remain, eager for the chance to prove they can win it all. The immunity challenge examines each cowboy’s patience and control in a point system challenge. The contestant with the highest score won't have to sweat the next elimination round. When it looks like it might come down to a tie, the last cowboy to ride prevails. In the two-part elimination challenge, the contestants must gather and load a herd into a trailer before racing off to a neighboring field where they must doctor a few yearlings in open pasture. The green team starts strong, but a few wrong moves have major repercussions. On the blue team, a cowboy takes the lead, curious to see if his teammate will sink or swim under pressure. The elimination comes down to two rivals who don't hold back when it comes to letting Trace know why the other should go home. In the end, Trace sends the cowboy whose heart doesn't seem to be in it to win it, but they don't go quietly.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E11 Good Night Sweet Charlotte Charlotte, an old friend of Lou's, comes to Rock Creek and stirs up bad memories of a man who had hurt them both. Lou distances herself from Kid, but when Charlotte turns up dead, Lou confronts her past. Meanwhile, Jimmy befriends a Lakota Indian.

programme.title: McLintock!
programme.desc: A cattle baron awaits the return of his daughter from school and is surprised that his wife has returned to take their daughter away. He tries to keep the peace and do what is best for everyone.

programme.title: Kansas Pacific
programme.desc: With talks of a Civil War brewing, Southern saboteurs know they must keep Northern forces from using the U.S. train system. They devise a daring and dangerous plan to stop and capture a railroad engine, preventing the completion of a railroad line.

programme.title: The Big Trees
programme.desc: A timber baron plans to take advantage of a new law and make millions. Making his money turns out to be harder than he ever thought when the Quakers who own the land refuse to sell their precious trees.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E23 The Lost Treasure of Canyon Town On the way home to North Fork, Lucas, Micah, and Mark take a detour to Micah's hometown. A thriving mining town years ago, it is now a ghost town except for Mr. Newman and his son who still live there. Something is amiss, and a mystery is revealed.

programme.desc: S3 E4 Burton Mossman Crosses the Line After failing to capture the ruthless murderer Augustine Chacon on U.S. soil, Arizona Ranger Burton Mossman relinquishes his badge to cross the border. In Mexico, he goes undercover as a horse thief to join Chacon's gang and spring his trap.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E11 Good Night Sweet Charlotte Charlotte, an old friend of Lou's, comes to Rock Creek and stirs up bad memories of a man who had hurt them both. Lou distances herself from Kid, but when Charlotte turns up dead, Lou confronts her past. Meanwhile, Jimmy befriends a Lakota Indian.

programme.title: McLintock!
programme.desc: A cattle baron awaits the return of his daughter from school and is surprised that his wife has returned to take their daughter away. He tries to keep the peace and do what is best for everyone.

programme.title: Kansas Pacific
programme.desc: With talks of a Civil War brewing, Southern saboteurs know they must keep Northern forces from using the U.S. train system. They devise a daring and dangerous plan to stop and capture a railroad engine, preventing the completion of a railroad line.

programme.title: County Line
programme.desc: When his best friend, Sheriff Clint Thorne (Jeff Fahey, Texas Rising, Justified), is brutally gunned down, former neighboring county sheriff, Alden Rockwell (Tom Wopat, The Dukes Of Hazzard, Longmire) is left with many questions and no answers. After the investigation stalls and his replacement, Sheriff Preston (Grant Goodeve, Eight is Enough, Dynasty) turns a blind eye, Alden takes the case into his own hands. Uncovering a web of crime, deceit, and corruption that spreads through two counties, Alden is caught in a deadly criminal network with no backup, no badge, and local diner owner, Maddie (Patricia Richardson, Home Improvement, The West Wing) as his only ally. Seeking justice at any cost, Alden must find out who's behind this criminal enterprise, even if some lines must be crossed.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E5 The Journey Back Mark takes a job on new neighbor Will Temple's ranch but is taken back by Temple's badly scarred face. When a cavalry officer stops by the McCain Ranch looking for a deserter who committed murder, both Mark and Lucas question who Temple really is.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E6 The Decision While repairing a fence on his property, Lucas witnesses a murder. The killer, Corey Hazlett, is the son of a wealthy rancher named Frank Hazlett. When Lucas agrees to testify at Corey's trial, there are threats to harm Mark.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E7 Knight Errant Two old friends of Lucas', Don Chumera De Lardo and Colonel Black, come to the McCain Ranch. They are there to finish a deed of honor, even insisting on a jousting match. Lucas learns that the feud started over a chess game.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E8 Honest Abe A neighbor of Lucas' believes he is Abe Lincoln after being mentally injured in the Civil War. Townspeople go along with his impersonation since he is a kind man. However, when a saloon patron makes fun of him, trouble ensues.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E7 George Croghan: Frontier Peacemaker When Chief Pontiac organizes a coalition of Native American tribes to attack British forts, frontier trader George Croghan risks his life on a perilous journey into the wilderness to find Pontiac, negotiate a peace agreement, and prevent all-out war.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E12 The Hunt for Outlaw Bill Doolin When notorious outlaw Bill Doolin escapes from jail, the U.S. Marshals Service springs into action to end his four-year crime spree. Known as the “Three Guardsmen,” Deputy U.S. Marshals Heck Thomas, Bill Tilghman, and Chris Madsen have a reputation for always getting their man, but they know it won’t be easy with Doolin. Doolin is no ordinary outlaw: as a former member of The Dalton Gang and the mastermind of The Wild Bunch, he has successfully robbed banks, trains, and stagecoaches. After months of tracking Doolin, Heck Thomas is so close he barely stops to eat or sleep. When Thomas and his posse finally corner Doolin, he refuses to surrender, and gunfire is the only way out. Some years later, Bat Masterson, former-gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, catches up with Bill Tilghman to hear the real story behind the hunt for the outlaw Bill Doolin.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E13 Stagecoach Mary While working as a groundskeeper at a convent in Ohio, former slave Mary Fields forms a deep friendship with the superior, Mother Amadeus Dunne. When Mother Amadeus falls ill after traveling to Montana to open a girls’ school, Mary rushes to her rescue and nurses her back to health. Mary soon discovers that the Western Frontier satisfies her free-spirited nature, and she decides to stay in Montana for good. She secures a contract to deliver mail by stagecoach for the U.S. Postal Service, becoming the first African American woman to carry mail. With a fearless attitude and multiple firearms, she protects the mail from would-be bandits and is soon known far and wide. Some years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson meets Sister Amadeus and gets the true story of “Stagecoach Mary.”.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S5 E3 Road to Three Graves Cheyenne helps his friend Tuk deliver equipment across private property to a mine. However, they run into major problems when they encounter a detestable landowner who wants the equipment for himself.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E7 Panic Lucas and Mark find a young couple in a wagon who are suffering from a fever. Lucas takes them to his ranch where a doctor confirms it to be yellow fever. No-good Brett Conway spreads the word in North Fork and panic sets in.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E8 Ordeal Lucas and Mark travel through the desert to get a supply of salt when a rattlesnake spooks their horses, causing the wagon to overturn. A horse must be put down due to injury and Lucas is also badly hurt. Mark has no choice but to go for help alone.

programme.title: Sitting Bull
programme.desc: A U.S. Cavalry officer begins to understand the plight of the Sioux and arranges a meeting between Chief Sitting Bull and President Grant.

programme.title: Once Upon a Texas Train
programme.desc: An outlaw and a Texas Ranger have a life-long personal feud, but now, as grumpy older men, they must put their differences aside and face a common problem - a young gang of outlaws ravaging Texas.
